sub_title: Digital Executive / Business Designer / Leadership Coach
summary:
My purpose is to enable more meaning and joy in the workplace through the disciplined pursuit of simplicity.

As a Digital Executive, I take a deeply human approach when engaging with people to allow their passion and professionalism to emerge and shine. My specialty is connecting the product development pipeline to clear and tangible customer value. In service to the engineering and technical teams that I am responsible for, I design a simplified business context that enables the most value to be created with the least amount of unnecessary tension.  Ideal organizations are Saas product companies with complex data management requirements that are shifting their product strategies.

#digital #innovation #human

As a Business Designer, I guide leaders at various levels in companies to achieve strategic alignment within themselves and with their leadership peers. This is based on a disciplined approach to management team alignment based on the ‘Simple Business Design’ framework. This is particularly helpful for teams undergoing deep change such as strategic transformation and acquisitions or mergers. Ideal teams new or reforming groups that need to align and perform quickly at a high level of performance.

#business #design #simplicity

As a Leadership Coach, I work closely with leaders and managers on an individual basis and as a key part of my Digital Executive and Business Designer work.  My deep conviction is that people have a fundamental need for love and simplicity in their lives.  My experience proves that people need support to engage creatively and constructively to hold difficult conversations within themselves and with the people near them.  Ideal clients are often technical leaders struggling to engage with their business peers and business executives struggling to engage their technical collaborators.

#leadership #coaching #love

treasury_media.title: Choose What Not To Do with Nick McRoberts
treasury_media.description: In this podcast episode, Chris talks with Nick McRoberts shares how choosing what not to do has enabled him to succeed throughout his life as a composer and coach. Like many artists, his first challenge was figuring out which of the many things that interested him he actually had a talent for.

treasury_media.title: Healthy Engagement at Work with Gerphil Kerkhof
treasury_media.description: This special podcast episode is inspired by Movember – the worlds largest movement in support of Men’s health.  Gerphil and Chris have an open conversation about healthy engagement at work.  It is a special conversation between two people passionate about creating the best possible conditions for people to succeed.

projects.title: 48 Hour Film Project
projects.description:
Co-Producer

The 48 Hour Film Project is a wild and sleepless weekend in which you and a team make a movie - write, shoot, and edit - in just 48 hours. On Friday night, teams draw a genre from a hat. They are then given a character, prop and line to include in their films. On Sunday night, in a wild dash to the drop off event, the film is turned in - and teams celebrate. The film is then screened at a local theater in front of an audience of filmmakers, friends and families.

profile_positions.description:
Digital strategy consulting, strategic alignment workshops and leadership coaching.  

Engagements include:
• Various leadership coaching clients with a focus on succeeding in times of major change
• IT strategy advisory and coaching of new CTO for a commodities trading company
• Strategy alignment workshops for Saas company management team
• Sustainability Sprint facilitation to kick-start their strategic ambitions (multiple companies)
• Technical due diligence regarding automation software in the automotive industry
• Digital business application architecture design and solution selection for a Fashion brand
• Customer loyalty and data management project for a European hotel chain
• Transformational leadership coaching programme for a global Chemical company
• Customer experience design training and facilitation for an Asian retail company

Ebullient Business Designers is my own agency that supports leadership achieve clarity, confidence and control during times of transformational change.  I proudly work with the following partner organisations: Qhuba, Enablers Network, ELP, OpenExO, Adjugo and Purpose Alliance.
profile_positions.title: Business Designer and Leadership Coach

profile_positions.description:
Host conversations with business leaders and experts from around the world about how the succeed through the disciplined pursuit of simplicity.

The Business Simplicity Podcast is where leaders share their most successful strategies and the failures that inspired them so you can avoid the suffering and reap the benefits.
profile_positions.title: The Business Simplicity Podcast Host

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the successful introduction of the Tactful AI (Cambridge and Cairo) omnichannel customer engagement company into the group and facilitated the commercial product launch into Europe.

Managed the integration of the Telepo (Sweden) and Escaux (Belgium) software engineering teams and facilitated the new architecture approach based on the strengths of the teams into a compelling product vision.

Dstny is Europe's largest cloud business communications provider for SME's and service providers.
profile_positions.title: Chief Platform & Innovation Officer

profile_positions.description:
Transformed the product and technology teams from the energy retailer into a new company with an agile-first organisation with a fully cloud-based software-as-a-service proposition for sales globally.

Powerpeers is the largest peer-to-peer energy sharing marketplace in the world with over 35,000 active customers in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Chief Technology Officer

profile_positions.description:
Co-developed the 'Automated Decision Intelligence Architecture,’ and managed various data projects in banking, insurance, and government.

Pretty Good Knowledge was a data analytics and privacy consulting company enabling governments and corporations to benefit from intelligence agency level prescriptive analytics capabilities.
profile_positions.title: Chief Experience Officer & Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Re-defined and transformed the complete Business Technology organisation to better support international expansion, with budget responsibility over €10 million.  Renewed the investment plan by strategically re-using available technologies.  Dramatically accelerated the development and launch of the new customer portal through design sprints and agile processes.

ABN AMRO Lease is one of the largest providers of asset-based financing in Western Europe.
profile_positions.title: Head Change & Innovation

profile_positions.description:
Achieved the integration of more than technology functions from the Athlon subsidiaries across Western Europe into the global organisation within nine months.  Later, took the role of strategic advisor on a global cloud and enterprise mobility programme.

De Lage Landen (DLL) is the world’s largest vendor finance provider, operating in over 30 countries.
profile_positions.title: Transformation Manager

profile_positions.description:
Fundamentally restructured the central functions to focus on value, managing over €7 million direct budget and over 40 FTE: business process management, business intelligence, indirect procurement, information security, and enterprise architecture. Achievements include launching the first mobile app for mobility / leasing in Europe and establishing the first successful central data warehouse. 

LeasePlan Corporation is the world’s largest provider of mobility and fleet solutions, with over 1.3 million vehicles under management.
profile_positions.title: Senior Vice President & CIO

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for geographic expansion for the group, developed structure for analysing geographic potential and a ‘lean thinking’ method for country start-ups.  Actively supported the new local management to achieve their early successes.

LeasePlan Romania is the new country start-up which achieved break-even faster than any country office in the LeasePlan Group.
profile_positions.title: Strategy Director

profile_positions.description:
Provided transformation strategy and corporate oversight for this AUS$60 million transformation programme which resulted in the successful change of the company’s fundamental business design.

LeasePlan Australia was the first mobility / leasing company to achieve a fully automated work flow for the entire customer journey from ordering to delivery and the first successful SAP implementation in the "full service leasing" industry.
profile_positions.title: Project Director

profile_positions.description:
Managed the establishment of the company in Ireland and continued migration of group subsidiary services with a P&L of €30 million and over 30 employees.

LeasePlan Information Services is the internal shared-services company providing application development and hosting services to the group.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.description: Responsible for establishing an internal shared services technology company.

profile_positions.description: Provided technology and process consulting services for various companies while completing the MBA.
